name: Rachael's Turkey Sausage Burgers with Peppers & Onions
ingredients: 1 green or yellow bell pepper, sliced

instructions.en: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in skillet. Sauté peppers and onions until tender, seasoning with salt and pepper. Remove and keep warm.
instructions.sk: Rozohrejte 1 lyžicu oleja na panvici. Opečte papriky a cibuľu do mäkka, ochuťte soľou a korením. Odstráňte a udržujte teplé.
instructions.ja: フライパンで大さじ1の油を熱し、ピーマンと玉ねぎを塩コショウで味付けしながら柔らかくなるまで炒めます。取り出して温めておきます。

instructions.en: Combine turkey, fennel, garlic, salt, pepper, parmesan, parsley, and crushed red pepper. Form into 4 patties.
instructions.sk: Zmiešajte morku, fenikel, cesnak, soľ, korenie, parmezán, petržlen a drvené červené korenie. Vytvarujte 4 fašírky.
instructions.ja: 七面鳥のひき肉、フェンネル、ニンニク、塩、コショウ、パルメザン、パセリ、赤唐辛子を混ぜ合わせ、4つのパティを作ります。

instructions.en: Heat remaining oil in skillet. Cook patties 3-4 minutes per side. Top each with cheese and let stand until melted.
instructions.sk: Rozohrejte zvyšný olej na panvici. Smažte fašírky 3-4 minúty z každej strany. Na každú položte syr a nechajte postáť, kým sa neroztopí.
instructions.ja: 残りの油をフライパンで熱し、パティを両面3〜4分ずつ焼きます。各パティにチーズをのせ、溶けるまで置いておきます。

instructions.en: Serve burgers topped with the peppers and onions.
instructions.sk: Podávajte fašírky s paprikami a cibuľou navrchu.
instructions.ja: バーガーにピーマンと玉ねぎをのせて提供します。

notes: Makes 4 servings. The burgers can be frozen without the toppings.
